Articles.Content:
This question is almost certain answered elsewhere here.

What parts, when used on the same craft, are able to touch the craft? 
By touch, I mean "not pass through."

There is an 'outstanding issue' that a craft does not check whether it collides with itself. I believe that this is the case for all parts. This can be especially annoying when you have just attached a sub-module on a wobbly docking port and attempt to launch it.

I've seen craft where landing legs or landing gear are used to push parts of the same craft away (a x-wing replica lately), so at least they seem to collide with their own craft.

Regards

Tantalus
